error.message: Calls to function dpm should not exist.
Call to deprecated function render(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Render\RendererInterface::render() instead.
Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase::$defaultTheme is required. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3083055, which includes recommendations on which theme to use.
